name: Museum of Emotions v1.0
description:
This is a project developed at the University of Tsukuba for a workshop class whose theme is Metaverse + Education, in the Design department (June,2022). Vithor Silva and Cui Weiran developed this museum, the so-called Museum of Emotions, to help people on the journey of learning about mental health, a sensitive topic but of extreme importance.  In this virtual space, you can walk around and learn about emotions, then, in another space, about depression and anxiety. Lastly, you can get inside the workshop space where you can read hints on how to make yourself feel better about your feelings. 

NOW WORKING BETTER ON PC AND MACBOOK ONLY.

It is important to say that some of the images were used from Freepik and Splash websites. 

The BGM song played is:

And So It Begins by Artificial.Music https://soundcloud.com/artificial-music Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 Unported— CC BY 3.0 Free Download / Stream: https://bit.ly/and-so-it-begins Music promoted by Audio Library
